clip.quote: These next few months, the winter months, the holiday season, if you will... view it as separation season.
clip.why_clipworthy: Challenges the conventional view of the holiday season as downtime.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you using the holiday season to get ahead or falling behind?

clip.quote: If you're committed to your goal, the holidays, the weather, other people's actions leave you absolutely unfazed.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the difference between being committed and merely interested.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you truly committed to your goals or just interested?

    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Paul shares that when you're genuinely committed, external factors lose their power over you. It's the difference between achieving your dreams and just dreaming.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) This mindset shift can transform your business. Focus on commitment, not interest, to navigate challenges effortlessly.",
